original_title: SLT-MOBITEL’s exceptional performance wins four awards at National Business Excellence Awards 2023
original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL, the National ICT Solutions Provider was honoured with four prestigious awards at the National Business Excellence Awards 2023, held recently. The recognition demonstrates the outstanding achievements and commitment to excellence in the telecommunications industry by Sri Lanka Telecom PLC (SLT).

SLT received accolades for Runner Up: Excellence in Local Market Reach, Runner Up: Sector Award for Infrastructure & Utilities and Merit Awards for Category award: Extra Large Business and Excellence in Corporate Governance.

Prabhath Dahanayake, Group Chief Marketing Officer, and Sanjeewa Samaranayake, Group Chief Financial Officer, of SLT-MOBITEL were present at the awards ceremony together with several other company personnel.

The National Business Excellence Awards (NBEA) is held annually and is among the eagerly awaited events of the business community. Organised by the National Chamber of Commerce Sri Lanka (NCCSL), the NBEA recognizes business enterprises, which have demonstrated business excellence, whilst contributing to the economic progress of the country.
